mil.nga.giat.geowave.analytics.sample.functions

Class CentroidDistanceBasedSamplingRankFunction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.analytics.sample.functions.CentroidDistanceBasedSamplingRankFunction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The data type for the object being sampled
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SamplingRankFunction<T>

    public class CentroidDistanceBasedSamplingRankFunction<T>
extends Object
implements SamplingRankFunction<T>
    Rank objects using their distance to the closest centroid of a set of centroids. The specific rank is determined by the probability of the point meeting being a centroid, modeled in the implementation of SampleProbabilityFn. The farther the distance, the higher the rank.
